rules_text:
{G}{U}, {T}, Exile a creature card from your graveyard: Create a token that's copy of the exiled card, except it's a 1/1 Construct in addition to its other types.
{2}: Transform Joran, Fallen Friend. Activate only if there are no creature cards in your graveyard.
rules_text2:
Trample
Moebius J gets +1/+0 for each untapped construct you control.
At the beginning of your upkeep if you are stagnant transform Moebius J. [i](You are stagnant if you didn't attack a player during your last turn.)[/i]
